Summary: Triangular craft with 3 lights and 1 in the middle
trends: There have been 31 other sightings in Winston-Salem
There were no other sightings in Winston-Salem on or around December 27th 2006
divs: Sighting DetailsWell I was driving home from the gym and i rolled down my windows to get some fresh air and to my left I saw a Triangular looking object that was about a couple hundred feet across was hard to tell since it was dark outside . The object had 1 white light on each corner that blinked after one another and a small glow in the center . The object was moving very slow and very low to the ground. The area that the object was moving has a valley with horses and other animals this is the second time i have seen a triangular craft moving in the same path in this area .
